p.k: Lola’s mother has installed a Geocaching application on her daughter’s phone. Lola is over the moon and heads outside to start playing. Victor also decides to install the application to find the treasure before his neighbor. The kids set out in search of the hidden treasure and Pat helps his best friend find clues. But when the Guanos steal Lola’s phone our hero has to outsmart the pigeons retrieve the phone and help Lola to find the treasure first.
